import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Card, Label, Image, Button,Modal,Header} from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class Events extends Component { state = { open: false } show = dimmer => () => this.setState({ dimmer, open: true }) close = () => this.setState({ open: false }) render() { const { open, dimmer } = this.state return (
{ this.props.events && this.props.events.map(event=> alert("MEMES")} fluid style = {{ backgroundColor: "#4c4c4c", boxShadow:"none", borderRadius: '25px'}} raised > {event.title} {event.description} )} Select a Photo
